summary: Distraught by her gay friend's death, a young Dutch woman travels to her dead friend's small American town to make a documentary about homosexuality in Bumblefuck USA.
cast: Ryan Gourley|Ryan Overton|Heidi M. Sallows|Jeff Smith|Cat Smits|John Watkins
director: Directors: Aaron Douglas Johnston, Sam de Jong
title: Bumblefuck, USA
